item.title: Discord is not documentation
item.description: - Discord is a popular real-time communication platform that can be used for getting help and staying updated on what others are working on.

item.title: Who employs your doctor? Increasingly, a private equity firm
item.description: - Private equity firms have started buying doctors' practices in the healthcare industry.

item.title: How I run my servers (2022)
item.description: - The author describes their setup for running servers, including the use of VMs, Debian 10, and server software written in Rust.

item.title: The Pacific Northwest Tree Octopus
item.description: - The Pacific Northwest tree octopus is a rare and unique creature found in the temperate rainforests of the Olympic Peninsula on the west coast of North America.

item.title: 6 days to change 1 line of code (2015)
item.description: - A company needs to change a setting in their software to increase their backlog limit from 3 months to 4 months in order to keep everyone busy and avoid layoffs.

item.title: Underwater ears everywhere
item.description: - Hydrophones and wide-area sonar are important military surveillance technologies that are used to detect and locate submarines underwater.

item.title: SoundStorm: Efficient Parallel Audio Generation
item.description: - SoundStorm is a model for efficient audio generation that produces high-quality audio faster than previous methods.

item.title: Forth: The programming language that writes itself: The Web Page
item.description: - Forth is a flexible programming language created by Chuck Moore that allows for easy modification of values and uses a stack-based approach for manipulating data.

item.title: How to register a Kei truck in Pennsylvania
item.description: - Kei trucks are a special type of Japanese car that have small engines and dimensions and are available for purchase in the US due to Japan's tax incentives.

item.title: How to Use AI to Do Stuff: An Opinionated Guide
item.description: - The post provides an opinionated guide on how to use AI for various tasks.
